availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John and Patsy Mann. Married to Mary Jane Kene Mann on September 18, 1855. Father of Amilda Mann, Emily Mann, and Patsey Mann. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, p. 73-74. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Owsley County Marriages, p. unknown. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994045, Owsley County Deaths, p. unknown.
